name: Split to frames
description:
Split your frames into smaller frames.

Create a carousel or a grid for social media easily.


How to use this plugin:

  1. Select a frame/component
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Choose width & height / Rows & columns that you want to split by (For example: 1200 & 1200 for Instagram carousel)
  4. Click on 'Add grid' to add a grid that is based on your selection
  5. Click on 'Split to frames' to split


An important note:

Make sure the original frame's size is a duplication of the values you enter.
